title: Juno and the paycock
creator_credit: British International Pictures and Alfred Hitchcock
brief_description: This adaptation of Sean O’Casey’s play by director Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville was lauded by the critics but Hitchcock was dissatisfied with the finished film. During the Dublin uprising, an impoverished family stand to receive an inheritance but things do not go as planned and the money does not come through. Their daughter is soon to give birth to an illegitmate child and their son is accused of being an informer.
